body_html: I'm seeing this again for python2 pandas (0.20.1) and would love to see zlib used instead of gzip because when i handle the files myself with zlib the issue is fixed but when pandas pd.read_csv(filename, compression='gzip', error_bad_lines=False, chunksize=chunksize) is used it fails miserably too often.
body_text: I'm seeing this again for python2 pandas (0.20.1) and would love to see zlib used instead of gzip because when i handle the files myself with zlib the issue is fixed but when pandas pd.read_csv(filename, compression='gzip', error_bad_lines=False, chunksize=chunksize) is used it fails miserably too often.
body: I'm seeing this again for python2 `pandas (0.20.1)` and would love to see zlib used instead of gzip because when i handle the files myself with zlib the issue is fixed but when pandas `pd.read_csv(filename, compression='gzip', error_bad_lines=False, chunksize=chunksize)` is used it fails miserably too often.
